definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: Can swine flu be treated with antiviral medications?
sentences.chinese: 是否抗濾過性病原體藥物可以治療豬流感？

sentences.english: There are tea leaves in my cup - you haven't strained the tea.
sentences.chinese: 我的杯子裏有茶葉，你沒有濾過茶。

sentences.english: This makes it easier to get viral and bacterial infections.
sentences.chinese: 肌體更容易感染濾過性病毒和細菌病毒。

sentences.english: The authors observed the morphologie changes of reparative tissue after filtering procedure in rabbit.
sentences.chinese: 本文觀察了兔眼濾過手術癒合過程的組織病理學變化。

sentences.english: After 4 months of on-line hemofiltration, the number of CD14+CD16+ cells, microparticles, and EPCs decreased.
sentences.chinese: 在線血液濾過4個月後，上述指標都有所減少。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the influence of filtering bleb on tear film and corneal function after trabeculectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察小梁切除術後濾過泡對角膜和淚膜的影響。

sentences.english: The glomerular filtration rate remains relatively constant .
sentences.chinese: 腎小球濾過率也能保持恆定。

sentences.english: The light filters through a roof with beautiful vaulted sheds more than 7 meters high.
sentences.chinese: 光線從屋頂濾過，美麗的拱形遮棚超過七米高。

sentences.english: No significant changes were observed in glomerular filtration rate and rennin activity after administration of RDA.
sentences.chinese: 用藥前後腎小球濾過率和腎素活性均無顯著性差異。

sentences.english: Incidence of complications and functioning filtering blebs were compared.
sentences.chinese: 比較兩組術後濾過泡存在時間及併發症發生率。

sentences.english: Objective To approach the treatment methods of filtration bleb complication after glaucoma surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討青光眼濾過泡併發症的治療方法。

sentences.english: Water filters through sandy soil and into the well.
Wood ashes are leached to extract lye.
sentences.chinese: 木炭被濾過以提取鹼液。

sentences.english: Heilbron DC et al. , Expressing glomerular filtration rate.
sentences.chinese: 兒童中腎小球濾過率的表達。

sentences.english: The precipitation and filtration properties of prussian blue waste water are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了華藍廢水的濾過性能和沉降性能。

sentences.english: Amyloid buildup often affects the kidneys, damaging their filtering system.
sentences.chinese: 沉積在腎臟，則損害濾過系統。

definition: clear soup/white broth, also called 奶湯|奶汤[nai3 tang1]/decoction of chrysanthemum, liquorice and certain other herbs
initial/first letter of word (in Latin script)
gonorrhea (TCM term)/more commonly known as 淋病[lin4 bing4]
Later Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms (386-403)
